participant_1.background:
I am not a good swimmer, but I try my best.
I'm a loner who likes to spend time with my dog.
Last year, I found inspiration in the world and used it to help my clients with their taxes.
I am passionate about making music and expressing myself through it.
I am grateful for my family's support, but I need to make some changes to my lifestyle.

My favorite people are the ones who get me out of my comfort zone and make me try new things.
to free my mind from feeling depressed i look up at the stars at night.
I enjoy spending my free time looking for interesting things to add to my collection.
I've kept my grandchildren's ages a secret from my parents because they're old-fashioned and would disapprove.
i lay awake at night so i can watch the stars.

content.text: Hey I'm in a weird mood today, just feeling down and out. I'm trying to think of something to cheer me up.
I'm sorry to hear that! What's on your mind?
I'm not sure. I guess I'm just feeling lost and directionless. I need to make some changes in my life, but I don't know where to start.
I can relate. I've been there before. Sometimes it helps to talk to someone about it. Or, you could try doing something different to shake things up. Go for a walk, take a class, or try a new hobby.
Thanks for listening. I appreciate it. I think I'm going to go for a walk and clear my head.
That sounds like a great idea. I hope you feel better!
Hey, have you ever tried stargazing? It's really calming and peaceful. I like to lay in the grass and just look up at the stars.
I haven't, but it sounds like it would be really relaxing. I might try that tonight.
Let me know how it goes! I'm sure you'll enjoy it.
